actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to prohibit Members of Congress from determining their own compensation.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Creates a commission to establish the annual rate of pay for Members of Congress on January 1 of each odd-numbered year. Makes March 1 of that calendar year the effective date for such annual rate of pay. Makes appropriations to the Commission for purposes of carrying out its duties.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to prohibit Members of Congress from determining their own compensation.
